attributes.action: Introduce road pricing nationwide and channel the money into improving public transport and conditions for walking and cycling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Introduce road pricing nationwide and channel the money into improving public transport and conditions for walking and cycling."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13957.asp

Prime Minister's Office
